SEARCH
Package io.github.lycoriscafe.nexus.http.core.statusCodes.annotations

Annotation Interface SeeOther

@Documented @Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(METHOD) public @interface SeeOther
Mark endpoint method as an HTTP redirect endpoint. The redirect response HTTP status code will 303 See Other. The point is when API user's API changed, user can just annotate it with this and ignore the deep in-method response processing part (if this annotation presents, the method will not execute). To use this annotation, one of the request method annotation must be presented. 
     
     @SeeOther("/redirectEndpoint")
     @GET("/sampleGetEndpoint")
     public static HttpResponse sampleGetEndpoint(HttpGetRequest request,
                                                  HttpResponse response) {
         // method will not execute ...
         return response;
     }
Since:
v1.0.0
